content: description find the sun in style with the sunny cinch satchel crafted with double stranded yarn the sunny cinch satchel boasts durability and a rich texture that s both soft and sturdy the bag s drawstring closure is accented with a cute sun motif to add a touch of whimsy designed with a strong cross-body strap this satchel offers hands free convenience and comfortable wear the free pattern is available on my blog 1 a kit is available with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your bag plus a free copy of the pdf digital download you can also customize your yarn color a full video tutorial is available on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-sunny-cinch-satchel-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/4krjp 3 https //youtu be/prbp7yaya2e
